item.description:
5 Humorous Cards For Your Funny Valentine

1. Long Live The Kling

Our pick of the funnies.

item.title: The 5 Cutest Valentine’s Day Cards This Side of Equestria
item.description:
The 5 Cutest Valentine’s Day Cards This Side of Equestria 

3. Yeah, Doge

Kawaii smiles, hand-holding, hundreds and thousands, pun-based humour. This card couldn’t get any sweeter if it was dipped in frosting and dusted with icing sugar. And if donuts are a little sugary for your tastes, check out the rest of the cutie-pie puns at the Magically Crafted Etsy shop (You’re My Cup Of Tea is another strong favourite). £2.80 shipped to the UK, £4.30 everywhere else.

item.title: 1. Flowers Are For Life, Not Just For Valentine's Day
item.description:
1. Flowers Are For Life, Not Just For Valentine's Day

 3. Give Us This Month Our Monthly Chocolates

With a little help from your friends at Unfunny, you may well achieve superhero status for picking the perfect present this Valentine's Day. But as the days and weeks wear on, the colours on that costume may begin to fade. Letterbox subscriptions to the rescue! Give a gift that keeps on giving and your partner will be reminded of your undying love for them on an ongoing basis. Hello perennial prestige!

item.title: Diptyque Releases Romantic Emojis For Valentines Day
item.description:
Diptyque Releases Romantic Emojis For Valentines Day

Luxury Parisian perfumiers Dyptique have released a romantic keyboard for iOS in time for this year's Valentine's Day. If your partner digs the charming pencil-sketch illustration style found in Parisian Chic or at My Little Paris, they'll love to receive a few of these cutesy hand-drawn hearts and roses in their Whatsapp window.
